application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Conditions 3 and 4 (External Details), 7 (Archaeological Assessment) and 9 (Public Realm Improvement Plan) of planning permission 20/01880/FUL (Variation of Condition 2 (Approved Plans), Condition 5 (Cycle Storage), Condition 10 (Fans, Louvres, Ducts, Plant or External Lighting) and Condition 11 (Refuse Storage) of Planning Permission ref 17/12088/FUL (Partial demolition of 11-13 Thames Street (with the retention of the Listed facade) and construction of a five storey attached building to provide retail (A1) at ground floor level and 10 x 2 bed and 16 x 1 residential units (C3) above) for alterations to elevations and internal layout.
site_name: 11-13 Thames StreetKingston Upon ThamesKT1 1PH
decision_conditions: The applicant is informed that the submitted details for Conditions 3 and 4 (External Details), 6 (Sustainable Homes), 7 (Archaeological Assessment) and 9 (Public Realm Improvement Plan) of planning permission 20/01880/FUL have been assessed and are hereby approved subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the approved details.
